name: Bot Basket Brawl!
description:
Story:

2 friends catch wind of a basketball tournament. These 2 are Dunk, a rad anthro basketball, and Robot Friend, a robot with a cool spring on top. Anyway, our cool duo set out to win the tourney!

You play as Dunk! Face against 6 opponents and co-operate with Robot Friend to hop into that goal and dunk into those jerks' egos.

Controls:

A and D or arrows keys to move

Space to dunk
